shots.description: Medium shot of Elizabeth and Jane sitting in a cozy drawing room, the warm firelight casting a soft glow on their faces. Elizabeth's expression is pensive as she holds a letter, while Jane watches her sister with concern.
Close-up of Elizabeth's face, her brow furrowed as she reads the letter, the flickering flames reflecting in her eyes.
Over-the-shoulder shot of Jane, her face half-lit by the firelight, as she leans towards Elizabeth with a reassuring expression.
Two-shot of the sisters, Elizabeth's face reflecting a mix of emotions as she looks up from the letter, meeting Jane's gaze.
shots.dialogue: "It is from Miss Bingley, informing me of their departure from Netherfield..."
